To anyone who does not get it to work on new Windows versions: Use DOSBox.

Install manual:
1. mount image or burn it onto a cd and put into cd drive.
2. Start DOSBox
3. Mount your hard drive as drive X, and the cd or image as drive Y
4. Go to drive Y and type 'setup'
5. Install the game to a folder on your hard drive.
6. Set up sound and music
7. Quit setup, the path will be automatically set to the game path
8. Start the game by typing 's2' and pressing enter
Have fun!

When you quit and want to start again, just start DOSBox, mount your drive as X, navigate to the Settlers 2 map and type 's2' to start.
